channel.title: perturbo-code.github.io
channel.description: PERTURBO is an open source software to compute from first principles the scattering processes between charge carriers (electrons and holes) and phonons, defects, and photons in solid state materials, including metals, semiconductors, oxides, and insulators.

item.title: Release of PERTURBO 1.0
item.description: Release of the first version of PERTURBO code. For release details, visit [Release page][mydoc_release_notes_10]
